title: konflikkastil
author: konflikkastil
content: Can you please help with any Altcoins that coins that someone can invest on in this particular time.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: konflikkastil on July 10, 2023, 09:23:49 PMCan you please help with any Altcoins that coins that someone can invest on in this particular time.The list is long, visit: coinmarketcap or coingecko and then try to look to each of them. It will be looking like a shilling to you if somebody suggests a coin to buy.But, I'll give you a hint on what altcoins I am holding as of the moment. They're next to Bitcoin and that means that part of the top ones are the ones that I am holding.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: konflikkastil on July 10, 2023, 09:23:49 PMCan you please help with any Altcoins that coins that someone can invest on in this particular time.Since you do not have too much experience and for some reason you are avoiding bitcoin, maybe you already have enough of it, then you need to focus on the top altcoins on the market.Looking at the top 10 coins, there are two stable coins and a meme coin, bitcoin is not an altcoin, XRP is facing a lawsuit and Lido does not inspire me any confidence, so being realistic about it there are only 4 altcoins worth investing on the top 10, ETH, BNB, ADA and SOL, take a look at some of those coins and decide on your own if any of those coins is worthy of your investment, if not then maybe you should just invest in bitcoin or not invest in any coin at all.

comments.author: Gallar
comments.body: Quote from: konflikkastil on July 10, 2023, 09:23:49 PMCan you please help with any Altcoins that coins that someone can invest on in this particular time.There are indeed a lot of altcoins that exist today, and for beginners it will definitely be very confusing to choose one of them. Because beginners don't have an analysis of any of the altcoins.But I will advise you, if you insist on investing in altcoins, it is better for you to invest in altcoins that have ratings from 15 and below. Such as ethereum, BNB, XRP, and doge. Because of the coins that are in this ranking, in terms of market capitalization or trading volume, they are very high. Then these coin projects are very good and have the potential to be used as investment or traded. But this is just a suggestion from me, and it would be better if you do an independent analysis of the altcoin you want to buy. Because if the results of your own analysis, whatever the results are, it is your own decision.Because crypto investors in this forum, will surely suggest almost the same advice to you. Namely, it will advise you to buy altcoins that are ranked 15 and below. because this suggestion is indeed the most appropriate suggestion.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: this is not a good time for altcoins. If this is the beginning of a longer bull market, bitcoin gives better returns at the beginning, if the market were to turn around - bitcoin will dump less than alts. So now I recommend BTC and look for alts only when BTC breaks the previous ATH. The exception may be BNB, which is sharply dumped by the fud that has intensified around it in recent months, but it is a high-risk investment, because not only the SEC but also the governments of some countries are fighting against binance.

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: Since you don't know what to invest into from the over 10,000 Altcoins we have in this space, so as not to burn yourself, I will advise you to go for BNB tokens, from holding to participating in Launchpad, and Launchpool you will be earning decent profit from it, also there is a chance of BNB going over $1000 in the coming bull market, so it is a safe play for you, instead of jumping from one Altcoins to another

comments.author: MiF
comments.body: Quote from: konflikkastil on July 10, 2023, 09:23:49 PMCan you please help with any Altcoins that coins that someone can invest on in this particular time. 20k$ is not a small amount you can buy different altcoins on that amount,the best choice is the altcoins that is very well known and has a good rating on different tracking platform,or even the bnb and eth or matic this altcoins is good for long term and i believe it is very well known as a good investment you can also bought bitcoin for long term investment this coin will not give you a headache if only you have a big patience.

comments.author: Dr.Osh
comments.body: for $20k, you can choose ethereum only. it is the best altcoin available today. However, if you don't want to keep all your investments in one basket, then you can split them by BNB, or you can look it up yourself at coinmarketcap in the top 20 coins. to be honest, Choosing bitcoin and ethereum is enough for long term investment, but if you are looking for other altcoins, then choose popular coins that are on coinmarketcap.

comments.author: worle1bm
comments.body: Asking for investment advice here will also attract some scammers guiding you to put money in fake projects token with attractive offers also so don't fall for them easily.The amount is also big for $20k so if you are new learn about market and stick to some top altcoins only on Coinmarketcap that doesn't have chance to go to zero levels so risk is less.Also diversify the amount to split between some coins like btc or ETH rest do some research also rather then relying on others advice completely.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Often see threads like this with investment advice with tens of thousands of dollars, why? Do you want to invest a large amount?You can make a portfolio simulation on Coinmarketcap and choose a few altcoins that you think are good, I think asking other people for advice is not good unless you do your own research which ones are potential for investment, obviously don't focus too much on altcoins so you forget the main coin, bitcoin.My altcoin of choice is Ethereum that is already in the portfolio.

comments.author: bastian466
comments.body: The altcoins you are looking for are available and neatly organized with detailed information in a place called Coinmarketcap. You can compare and sort out which altcoins have the potential for investment. It's time to make a choice, don't be easily influenced by the advice of friends and other people, be more confident because the losses and profits are borne alone

comments.author: killerfrost
comments.body: Basic principles that I learned in this market:1. dyor2. rate and experience3. develop specific plans and target4. seek adviceso you need to get yourself some basics before you make any decision, I'm not sure my opinion is the same as yours about investing but in general what we are looking for is profits no matter what. short term or long term. There are many options, safe or risky to gain profits, personally I really love bitcoin, so I think if you are completely new give it a try before learning more. about altcoins.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: konflikkastil on July 10, 2023, 09:23:49 PMCan you please help with any Altcoins that coins that someone can invest on in this particular time.Buy bitcoin and top alts like eth. For now some alts will likely to move after these phase. Usually it started with bitcoin and follow up by these altcoins. Its really hard to suggest particular alts but if you are gonna bag them bow surely it is a really bargain for you and as long as you can wait for them to matured till bull run then you are good to go.

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: Quote from: konflikkastil on July 10, 2023, 09:23:49 PMCan you please help with any Altcoins that coins that someone can invest on in this particular time.The basic of investment is not to keep all your eggs in one basket. So if you really 20 grand, always diversify beyond cryptocurrency. Have a good amount of gold in your Portfolio so that it can support you during bad times. Bitcoin and ETH should also form a good percentage of your portfolio. Check coinmarketcap website and check the trading activities of various coins. This will give you an idea of active coins which has demand in the market. Then take a decision. Investing 20 grand in a single coin is a big no no.

comments.author: spectre71
comments.body: Investment and Altcoin should not be in the same room.Eth would be the alt to btc...Everything else is speculation at best.Whatever you do DCA slowly into it. But be prepared to lose most your money.

comments.author: Vivageneviv
comments.body: A couple of alts are doing good even in the bearish market but I'm currently drawn to $0x0, he native token of 0X0.ai which is an AI-powered Solidity Smart Contract Auditor. It just made its way to Bitget and has been a top gainer on the exchange

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: konflikkastil on July 10, 2023, 09:23:49 PMCan you please help with any Altcoins that coins that someone can invest on in this particular time.Right now I'd dive right into polygon.  They have a real solid project.  It's fairly cheap in terms of all time high and have recently announced  a shift to POL to be able to verify multiple blockchains.  I think over the next 3-5 years polygon will be one of the top plays.  *shill over*

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: konflikkastil on July 10, 2023, 09:23:49 PMCan you please help with any Altcoins that coins that someone can invest on in this particular time.Why will I have that kind of money and all what I will want to do is invest in altcoin, that’s really wrong, you know it’s really risky investing in altcoin, it’s better you just invest in bitcoin and if you really want to invest in altcoin, then it’s better you invest higher percent of the money into bitcoin and you can buy just little amount of altcoin, and when buying altcoin, avoid shit coins, your investment in altcoin should be on strong coins.

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: Everybody will have his own opinion and will have his favorite coins… If you are new to crypto, please do your own research and start with small amounts. Right now, crypto is doing pretty good but it can always drop 20-30% when there is some bad news.

comments.author: Cryptoababe
comments.body: Honestly, the market is speculative. And no coins can be 100% safe to invest in. But so far you are talking about Altcoins, its best to invest in altcoins with Benefits. Examples are Ones the supports liquidity mining like Canto and some other safe coins. And some Exchange coins that earn users some Benefits like BNB, BGB and some other good exchange coins. You can also buy some INJ and stake. These are my opinions. And you can always do your own research.
